title: AI boom drives data-centre dealmaking to record high
description: Global data-center dealmaking surged to a record high through November this year, driven by an insatiable demand for computing infrastructure to meet the boom in artificial intelligence usage
content:

title: Trump Media to merge with nuclear fusion company that wants to power AI
description: Trump Media & Technology announced its merger with TAE Technologies in an all-stock deal that the companies said Thursday is valued at more than $6 billion. The combined company says it plans to find a site and begin construction next year on the "world's first utility-scale fusion power plant," with aims to provide the electricity needed for artificial intelligence.

title: Robert Alexander of 360WiSE Explains Why AI Search Now Rewards Institutions Over Influence
description: By Robert Alexander, Founder & CEO of 360WiSE® Media AI search systems are no longer impressed by reach alone. The metrics that once defined digital success—followers, impressions, and viral velocity—are steadily losing influence as artificial intelligence becomes the primary filter for information discovery. In their place, AI engines are prioritizing institutions: entities built for credibility, […]

title: US launches review of advanced Nvidia AI chip sales to China
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. — United States President Donald Trump’s administration has launched a review that could result in the first shipments to China of Nvidia’s second-most powerful artificial intelligence (AI) chips, five sources said, making good on his pledge to allow the controversial sales.
